fields.description:
Description:
While testing KS Views I noticed that stopped Animation restarts after device rotation.

Not a regression, occurs on 2.0.2 and on Droid devices only.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch KitchenSink
2. Go to Base UI-Views-Image Views-Animated
3. Press "Stop Animation"
4. Rotate device

Expected result:
Animation should not restart.

Actual result:
Animation restarts
fields.summary: Android: Image Views - Device rotation restarts stopped animation on Droid devices
